titleStmt.title: The woman's victory: or, The conceited cuckold cudgel'd into good qualities, by his fair and vertuous wife. To the tune of, The languishing swain, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the sign of the Angel, in Guilt-spur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Publication date and Publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Angel, in Guilt-spur-street.
